remarks: The predictate "is a projective automorphism."  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pautset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pautset.m $e |- M = ( PAut ` K ) $.
ispautN $p |- ( K e. B -> ( F e. M <-> ( F : S -1-1-onto-> S /\ A. x e. S A. y e. S ( x C_ y <-> ( F ` x ) C_ ( F ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d K x $.
$d S x y $.
